expo.name:
ensure the bins on search screen is always the same height they change height when I click them. 
      
üèóÔ∏è PROFESSIONAL DESIGN SYSTEM WITH NATIVEWIND:

üåÉ SOPHISTICATED DARK THEME DESIGN SYSTEM:
        - Background: Dark gradients like ['#1a1a2e', '#16213e'] or ['#0f0f23', '#1a1a2e']
        - Glass cards: backgroundColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.1)', backdropFilter: 'blur(20px)', borderRadius: 20
        - Subtle borders: borderWidth: 1, borderColor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.2)'
        - Text colors: White (#ffffff) for titles, rgba(255,255,255,0.8) for descriptions
        - Modern shadows: shadowColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 8}, shadowOpacity: 0.3, shadowRadius: 16
        - Tab bar: backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)', backdropFilter: 'blur(20px)'
        - Accent colors: '#9333ea' (purple), '#06b6d4' (cyan), '#f59e0b' (amber)

üí® MANDATORY: USE NATIVEWIND (TAILWIND FOR REACT NATIVE):
- ALWAYS use NativeWind className instead of StyleSheet.create
- Use Tailwind utility classes for all styling
- Example: className="bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-900 to-slate-800 flex-1 p-6"
- Glass morphism: className="bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-xl rounded-3xl border border-white/20"
- Cards: className="bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-2xl rounded-2xl p-6 border border-white/10 shadow-2xl"
- Typography: className="text-white text-2xl font-bold" or className="text-white/80 text-base"
- Layout: className="flex-1 px-4 py-6" instead of flex: 1, padding

üéØ MANDATORY DESIGN STANDARDS (ALWAYS REQUIRED):

1. üìê NATIVEWIND COMPONENT STANDARDS:
   - Use Tailwind spacing: p-2, p-4, p-6, m-2, m-4, m-6 (8px grid)
   - Typography: text-2xl font-bold, text-lg font-semibold, text-base, text-sm
   - Rounded corners: rounded-3xl (cards), rounded-xl (buttons), rounded-lg (small)
   - Touch targets: h-11 min-h-[44px] for accessibility
   - Flexbox: flex-1, flex-row, justify-center, items-center

2. üß≠ RESPONSIVE NAVIGATION SYSTEM (CRITICAL):
   - ALWAYS render visible tab navigation at bottom
   - Glass morphism tab bar with backdrop blur
   - Active state indicators with smooth transitions
   - State management with useState for tab switching
   - 4-5 main tabs with icons and labels
   - Hamburger menu for additional options

3. üñºÔ∏è PROFESSIONAL ASSET LIBRARY:
   - High-quality Picsum images (more reliable than Unsplash)
   - Events: 'https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=1'
   - Conference: 'https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=2'
   - Music: 'https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=3'
   - Food: 'https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=4'
   - Business: 'https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=5'
   - Technology: 'https://picsum.photos/800/600?random=6'
   - Consistent aspect ratios and quality

4. üé® MODERN UI PATTERNS:
   - Glass morphism cards with backdrop filters
   - Floating action buttons with elevation
   - Search bars with subtle backgrounds
   - Loading states with skeleton screens
   - Empty states with helpful messaging
   - Smooth micro-interactions

5. üì± LAYOUT ARCHITECTURE:
   - SafeAreaView container
   - Header with glass morphism and search
   - ScrollView/FlatList for main content
   - Card-based information architecture
   - Bottom tab navigation (always visible)
   - Proper content hierarchy

6. ‚ôø ACCESSIBILITY & USABILITY:
   - Sufficient color contrast ratios
   - Readable font sizes and weights
   - Clear visual hierarchy
   - Meaningful button labels
   - Proper touch target sizes
   - Screen reader friendly structure

7. üé≠ ANIMATION & TRANSITIONS WITH NATIVEWIND:
   - Tab transitions: className="transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out"
   - Card states: className="transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 transition-transform duration-150"
   - Loading states: className="animate-pulse" or className="animate-spin"
   - Smooth animations: className="transition-opacity duration-500 ease-out"
   - Fade effects: className="opacity-0 animate-fade-in"

8. üìê NATIVEWIND LAYOUT SYSTEM:
   - Container: className="flex-1 bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-900 to-slate-800"
   - SafeArea: className="flex-1 pt-safe-top pb-safe-bottom"
   - Cards: className="m-4 p-6 bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-xl rounded-3xl border border-white/20"
   - Grid layouts: className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4" for 2-column, className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-3" for 3-column
   - Card grids: className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6 px-4"
   - Lists: className="px-4 py-2" for FlatList contentContainerStyle
   - Spacing: className="space-y-4" for vertical, className="space-x-3" for horizontal

9. üé® NATIVEWIND COLOR PALETTE:
   - Dark theme: from-slate-900, to-slate-800, bg-gray-900/50
   - Light theme: from-gray-50, to-white, bg-white/80
   - Glass effects: bg-white/10, bg-black/20, backdrop-blur-xl
   - Accents: text-blue-400, text-purple-400, text-emerald-400
   - Borders: border-white/20, border-gray-200/30

10. üì± NATIVEWIND RESPONSIVE PATTERNS:
   - Touch targets: className="h-12 px-4 rounded-xl" (minimum 44px height)
   - Typography scale: text-3xl font-bold, text-lg font-semibold, text-base
   - Icon containers: className="w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-white/20 items-center justify-center"
   - Button styles: className="px-6 py-3 bg-blue-500 rounded-2xl shadow-lg active:scale-95"

CREATE A POLISHED, PROFESSIONAL APP USING NATIVEWIND TAILWIND CLASSES FOLLOWING MODERN DESIGN SYSTEMS!
